name: Jungle fly (itch)
description:
How long can you fly? Find out , play jungle fly !

Have you ever dreamed of flying like a bird ? now you can ..........

which bird flies the fastest ? Only falcon click minds. the most advanced and epic bird racing game has arrived. how fast you could save if from obstacles. If you like racing games then this game is for you .

falcon is racing against the trees clouds in forest . you will be able to control the bird and help to survive by chasing movable trees and clouds. Simple controls to move bird by using space bar button.
